article.title: BAE Systems Receives Contract for Communication-Electronic Equipment and Systems Support
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: BAE Systems Technology Solutions and Services Incorporated is being awarded a $22 million modification to a previously awarded contract to exercise an option for maintenance, logistics and life-cycle services in support of communication-electronic equipment/systems and subsystems for various U.S. Navy, Army, Air Force, Special Operations Forces and other federal agencies.
